description: Product Description Devola - Heating & Cooling Specialists With an ever growing brand of specialist Cooling and Heating products offering market leading products Leading Technology & Smart Enabled Products Specialist In Heating & Cooling Products Over 100,000 Customers Committed to Quality Devola 9” Air Circulator With Remote Control, Digital Display & Timer This high performance 9” desk fan from Devola features an LED Display, Remote Control and Timer as well as a powerful 20W Silent DC motor which can quickly and efficiently cool small-medium sized rooms. Boasting an incredible 9 wind speeds and 3 operating modes, including a convenient sleep mode, this is one of the best performing desk fans currently on the market. The 3 state of the art ABS blades have been meticulously engineered to generate powerful air flow. 9 Wind Velocity Speeds 3 Fan Modes Normal Mode, Nature Mode and Sleep Mode Built in 9 Hour Timer Vertical and Horizontal Oscillation Touch Digital Display 3 7” Precision Engineered ABS Fan Blades 3 7” Precision Engineered ABS Fan Blades Automatic Vertical and Horizontal Oscillation Featuring 90-degrees of automatic vertical oscillation and 80-degree horizontal oscillation, this is one of the most versatile desk fans on the market as you can have precise control of the wide-angle air supply. 3 Fan Modes & 9 Wind Speeds Featuring 3 modes of operation including Normal, Nature and Sleep for varying wind patterns, combined with 9 wind velocity speeds up to 5.5m/s, this fan will exceed your cooling requirements in generating a comfortable cooling breeze. Remote Control & Timer Function The magnetic remote control offers additional functions such as muting the function selection sound and shutting off the digital display light whilst the fan continues to operate. The fan also features a start-up and shut-down 9 hour timer! Powerful Air Circulation Boasting an impressive wind throw distance, you can feel the air flow up to 8m away! In addition the DC motor rotates the ABS blades up to 1850 per minute for fast and effective cooling.
